name: Selfcare Website
tagline: A caregiver website which purpose is to provide information on how to treat and handle physically limited patients
body:
### Selfcare Website
This website was an academic project developed during my MSc, in which the main goal was to create a multimedia tool that allow the relatives of physically limited patients, to complement the information given by health professionals in their care and treatment.

![website](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9165833/AutocuidadoWebsite/Autocuidado_site.PNG)

### Contents
As this project is not finalized, it is recommended the visualization of the "Posicionar o Paciente Semi-Deitado de Lado" theme for the understanding of the developed work in this website.

Navigation: Temas>> Virar-se >> Posicionar o paciente semi-deitado de lado (in the end of the page)

![content](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9165833/AutocuidadoWebsite/Autocuidado_tema.PNG)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
